attributes.action: pass law that any MP found to have over claimed or manipulated expese claims be fired as am MP & the full power of the law be used to proscute them as would happen to any normal person
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the country is fed up with over claimed expeses by all parties MP's when the common man/woman is struggling to make ends meat

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
